title: Vayne build?
body:
So im thinking of playing vayne in ranked, i know she isnt THAT good but she seems like a champion you could solo carry with.
Right now i main: Lucian, Ezreal, Jinx and also want to start playing miss fortune. (use to main vayne so i know a decent amount about her)

The main thing is that for vayne i have seen many builds, for example, hurricane build (saw it on Phylol youtube), the youmuss build ive seen going around and finally the standard build i ran with before all this new stuff, Bork into crit.
So question is... which build(s) are better and which build is good for which situation.
also if you have some spare time tell me the build because im not fully sure what the full build may look like.
Hope you can help me climb :D (btw in gold 4 20 lp if that helps)

Also what are your thoughts on cull, should i buy it or not, not just for vayne though. For example should i buy it on jinx and ezreal if im against someone like twitch, or should i buy it when im against kogmaw?

If you need more information let me know! :D

Thanks in advance, {{champion:67}} 
Lika Sunryze

CORE: Statikk Shiv -> Infinity Edge -> Phantom Dancer (and Berserker's Greaves when you feel like it)
Next options: Bloodthirster, Mercurial Scimitar, Lord Dominik's Regards.

You can, but I don't recommend, rarely picking up Blade of the Ruined King.

Ability leveling: Q -> W -> E

This is just the current Vayne meta. The idea behind it is to do more burst in shorter times. Vayne has a very strong burst over about 5 seconds, this build is trying to reduce same burst to about 2 seconds. It's a pretty flexible build and you can customise it to however it works best for your play style.

Thank you, i tried it out as you saw and it works like a charm :D

Vayne's build is mostly Attack Speed to get off her stupid Silver Bolts that do far too much damage for any one champion in the game to be allowed to have.
Ultimately what you do build on her doesn't really matter though because of Silver Bolts, she's going to do the same damage no matter what you build, or even if you're behind and feeding.

Though I am bias against this piece of shit champion that legitimately has no counter play, Silver Bolts still applies even if Vayne is blinded or attacking someone in Shen's protective field that negates auto attacks, hell it even applies on Jax when he uses Counter Strike.

As for Cull {{item:1083}} it depends on the situation.
Are you good at CSing?
Is the champ you are playing easy to CS with?

I'll most often take Cull on champions like Ezreal where it's practically impossible to miss CS with.
It's a great item and the overall difference between taking it and D-Blade now is basically that Cull is free gold, or well gold neutral.
To be fair a 350g item being gold neutral in low elo doesn't actually mean much, but in high elo it means a lot.
